works.description:
The article "How to Connect to Windows  
Shared Folders from Linux OS" has been copied by the infringing blog  
starting with the text "Today users need a great deal of Applications  
within their operating system to get with their task of connecting to File
 
Servers at a quick rate. However it does not depend on which type of  
software, user is working whether its a Linux or Windows OS. In Linux,  
users usually dont get comfortable with seeking to connect to File Servers
 
or FTP Servers, which is the reason why, Linux has developed three quick  

ways in which users need to manipulate their Linux Software according to  

it. There are three proven ways to connect to Windows Shared Folders from 

Linux Software operating system." and continuing till the end of the  
article the whole text is copied
